statements.statement: select KHODUOC_ID,MAKHO, TENKHO, LOAIKHO_ID, LOAIDUOC, PHAMVI_ID, CHUYENKHOA_ID, PHONGBAN_ID, CASE WHEN KHOQUANLY_ID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE KHOQUANLY_ID END AS KHOQUANLY_ID, lst.DICTIONARY_CODE LOAIKHO from TM_KHODUOC kd left join LST_DICTIONARY lst on lst.DICTIONARY_ID = kd.LOAIKHO_ID where kd.TAMNGUNG = '0' and lst.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'LoaiKhoDuoc' and kd.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' order by kd.TENKHO
